name: NIMRODS
description:
Nimrods is a 3D platformer collect-a-thon where the player has to find and return the cherry to the muffin tower. The player has the option to go out and explore the level and find all the candies as well! 

This is just a small prototype that we developed over the past couple of months, however we definitely aim to keep working on this and provide more levels, storytelling and fun times! 

Follow us on Twitter for updates @homebrewint Controls:
  • WASD || Right Analog Stick -> Movement
  • Spacebar || A Button -> Jump/Double jump
  • Shift || Left Trigger-> Roll
  • Left Mouse Button || B Button -> Dash
  • Right Mouse Button || X Button -> Twirl
